amendment.description: To establish a digital and wireless network technology program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2371 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2371 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S9733-9737; text: CR S9733-9734) To establish a digital and wireless network technology program, and for other purposes.
